main.name: Rajat Rai
main.description: Mission-driven full stack developer with a passion for machine learning, efficient algorithms, thoughtful UI design and collaboration
main.bio: Versatile developer with 3+ years of experience in the security, finance, and services software industries. Demonstrated professional skills in Python, JavaScript, React, Java, and Spring-boot. True collaborator with strengths in adaptability and accuracy. Experienced in Client Communication and Scrum. Accustomed to working with cross-cultural, global teams.

resume.skillmessage: Schooling doesn't assure employment but skill does.

education.description: Former Graduate Student Assistant and current Graduate Research Assistant at FICS Research Lab • Learning Excellence Award

Member of Google Students Club • Winner of Design Sprint and Clean the Code • Organized Android Development Seminar and Hackathon sponsored by GDG and GSC • Technical Head for Algorhythm Fest in 2015 • Code Gladiators 2017 Semi Finalist

work.title: Graduate Research Assistant
work.description:
Working with a host of technologies on reverse engineering to design embedded firmware emulators.
Finding vulnerabilities in networking firmware in 3GPP/LTE Mobile devices using Fuzzing.

work.title: Graduate Student Assistant
work.description:
Research on machine learning and computer vision, under Dr. Navid Asadi, trying to resolve problems in Automated PCB Hardware Assurance.
Working on a region-based Neural network to locate and classify PCB markings as manufacturer logos.
Working to recognize Logos in a densely populated and high interference scenarios.
Achieved 76% accuracy using a hyper tuned RCNN on FICS annotated and online PCB logos data

work.title: Senior Technical Associate
work.description:
Client: Credit Suisse
Worked as an individual contributor to in-house banking web applications.
Upgraded web applications using newer technologies (React, Redux, Spring Boot) to improve performance and design.
Created an industry-leading reconciliation tool with configurable settings and added new workflows/features.
Increased code coverage on by 30% on an average per project with TDD using the Jest and JUnit testing frameworks

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description:
Integrated third party vendor API's using Cloud Elements (cloud API integration platform that enables developers to publish, integrate, aggregate, and manage all their APIs through a unified platform).
Added/updated and assessed new/old APIs from various vendors, improved reliability and performance.
Worked on SOAP/RESTful APIs and authentication techniques in cloud applications like OAuth, OAuth2, JWT

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description:
Worked on a multi-platform distributed firewall product.
Worked on Kernel and socket libraries in C/C++ and shell scripting.
Contributed in porting/developing of a virtual enforcement node to different flavors of Unix, also added advanced firewall filtering capabilities.
Increased products customer base by adding support for AIX and Solaris operating systems

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description:
Worked on the RHEL OS and developed daemon to log network statistics for all the network interfaces accurately.
Increased the accuracy of reported network statistics and contributed to Logs & Reports UI-backend integration.

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust

projects.title: Fury Fighting Gear
projects.category: (offline now) A fighting gear company I started

projects.title: Original Thai Food

projects.title: Resume Website

projects.title: Smirkspace
projects.category: (MVP Only) A React and Meteor based chat University project.

testimonials.text: Rajat’s a solid developer and very adaptable to team dynamics. A great guy to work with!

Rajat is a joy to work with. His excellent soft skills and a well-rounded personality make working with him a great experience. Not only is he a great team player but also is a quick learner. During his time at Credit Suisse, he learned an entirely new tech stack in a couple of weeks and afterwards went on to become the go-to person for almost everything related to our project. It's been awesome working with him and watch him jump into every project with curiosity, gratitude, and an infectiously upbeat attitude.
testimonials.designation: Associate Vice President at Credit Suisse
